sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { ThemeProvider, createTheme } from '@mui/material/styles';
import { Typography, AppBar, Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, CssBaseline, Grid, Toolbar} from '@mui/material'
import DashboardIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Dashboard';
import WidgetCard from './components/WidgetCard';
import Box from '@mui/material/Box';
import Paper from '@mui/material/Paper';
import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles';
import Button from '@mui/material/Button';
import Container from '@mui/material/Container';
import { padding } from '@mui/system';

const darkTheme = createTheme({
    palette: {
      mode: 'dark',
    },
  });


const App = () => {
  return (
        <>
        <ThemeProvider theme={darkTheme}>
            <CssBaseline/>
            <AppBar position="relative">
                <Toolbar>
                    <DashboardIcon />
                    <Typography variant='h6'>
                        Widget Dashboard
                    </Typography>
                </Toolbar>
            </AppBar>                  
        </ThemeProvider>
        <main>
                <Container maxWidth="lg">
                <Box sx={{ bgcolor: '#e6e6e6', height: '100%', padding: 5, margin: 5}}>
                    <Box sx={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
                        <Grid container spacing={5} columns={16}>

                            <Grid item lg={8} md={8}>
                                
                                    <Card sx={{ height: '100%' }}>
                                        <CardMedia

                                        />
                                        <CardContent>
                                            <Typography gutterBottom variant="h5" component="div">
                                            Lizard1
                                            </Typography>
                                            <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                                            Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                            species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                            Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                            species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                            Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                            species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                            Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                            species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                            Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                            species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                            Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                            species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                            Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                            species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica

                                            </Typography>
                                        </CardContent>
                                        <CardActions>
                                            <Button size="small">Share</Button>
                                            <Button size="small">Learn More</Button>
                                        </CardActions>
                                    </Card>
                                
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item lg={8} md={4}>
                            
                                    <Card sx={{  }}>
                                        <CardMedia

                                        />
                                        <CardContent>
                                            <Typography gutterBottom variant="h5" component="div">
                                            Lizard2
                                            </Typography>
                                            <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                                            Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                            species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                            </Typography>
                                        </CardContent>
                                        <CardActions>
                                            <Button size="small">Share</Button>
                                            <Button size="small">Learn More</Button>
                                        </CardActions>
                                    </Card>
                               
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item lg={5} md={4}>
                          
                                    <Card sx={{ height: '100%' }}>
                                        <CardMedia

                                        />
                                        <CardContent>
                                            <Typography gutterBottom variant="h5" component="div">
                                            Lizard3
                                            </Typography>
                                            <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                                            Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                            species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                            </Typography>
                                        </CardContent>
                                        <CardActions>
                                            <Button size="small">Share</Button>
                                            <Button size="small">Learn More</Button>
                                        </CardActions>
                                    </Card>
                              
                            </Grid>

                            <Grid item lg={6} md={4}>
                       
                                    <Card sx={{ height: '100%' }}>
                                        <CardMedia

                                        />
                                        <CardContent>
                                            <Typography gutterBottom variant="h5" component="div">
                                            Lizard4
                                            </Typography>
                                            <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                                            Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                            species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                            </Typography>
                                        </CardContent>
                                        <CardActions>
                                            <Button size="small">Share</Button>
                                            <Button size="small">Learn More</Button>
                                        </CardActions>
                                    </Card>
                             
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item lg={5} md={8}>
                        
                                    <Card sx={{ height: '100%' }}>
                                        <CardMedia

                                        />
                                        <CardContent>
                                            <Typography gutterBottom variant="h5" component="div">
                                            Lizard5
                                            </Typography>
                                            <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                                            Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                            species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                            </Typography>
                                        </CardContent>
                                        <CardActions>
                                            <Button size="small">Share</Button>
                                            <Button size="small">Learn More</Button>
                                        </CardActions>
                                    </Card>
                            </Grid>
                            <Grid item lg={18} md={4}>
                        
                        <Card sx={{ height: '100%' }}>
                            <CardMedia

                            />
                            <CardContent>
                                <Typography gutterBottom variant="h5" component="div">
                                Lizard6
                                </Typography>
                                <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                                Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica
                                Lizards are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000
                                species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica

                                </Typography>
                            </CardContent>
                            <CardActions>
                                <Button size="small">Share</Button>
                                <Button size="small">Learn More</Button>
                            </CardActions>
                        </Card>
                </Grid>
                        </Grid>
                    </Box>
                </Box> 
                </Container>
        </main>
        </>
  )
}

export default App;
